TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit AggregateException extends System.Exception

summary.span: 代表應用程式執行期間所發生的一或多個錯誤。

span.span: Represents one or more errors that occur during application execution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用來將多個失敗合併成單一、 throwable 例外狀況物件。 is used to consolidate multiple failures into a single, throwable exception object. 它廣泛用於[Task Parallel Library (TPL)](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-parallel-library-tpl.md)並[Parallel LINQ (PLINQ)](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/parallel-linq-plinq.md)。It is used extensively in the [Task Parallel Library (TPL)](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-parallel-library-tpl.md) and [Parallel LINQ (PLINQ)](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/parallel-linq-plinq.md). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[例外狀況處理](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md)和[如何：處理 PLINQ 查詢中的例外狀況](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-handle-exceptions-in-a-plinq-query.md)。For more information, see [Exception Handling](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/exception-handling-task-parallel-library.md) and [How to: Handle Exceptions in a PLINQ Query](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-handle-exceptions-in-a-plinq-query.md). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[彙總例外狀況](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/ee321571.aspx).NET 大小事部落格中的項目。For additional information, see the [Aggregating Exceptions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/ee321571.aspx) entry in the .NET Matters blog. ## Examples 下列範例會攔截例外狀況並呼叫方法來處理它所包含的每個例外狀況。The following example catches the exception and calls the method to handle each exception it contains. 編譯和執行範例的第一個`task1`變數應該會導致物件，其中包含例外狀況。Compiling and running the example with the first `task1` variable should result in an object that contains an exception. 標記為註解該行，取消註解第二個`task1`變數，以及編譯和執行範例會產生物件，其中包含例外狀況。Commenting out that line, uncommenting the second `task1` variable, and compiling and running the example produces an object that contains an exception. [!code-csharp[System.AggregateException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.aggregateexception.class/cs/exception1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AggregateException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.aggregateexception.class/vb/exception1.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有 public 和 protected 成員是安全執行緒，且可能會從多個執行緒同時使用。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 System.AggregateException： 發生一或多個錯誤。 」This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "System.AggregateException: One or more errors occurred." 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`.`null`.| ||當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。The localized error message string.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).

span.span: The exception could not be deserialized correctly.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`.`null`.| ||`message` 中指定的錯誤訊息字串。The error message string specified in `message`.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.AggregateException Flatten() cil managed

summary.span: 將 執行個體簡維成單一新執行個體。

span.span: Flattens an instances into a single, new instance.
A new, flattened .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果工作有附加的子工作擲回例外狀況，該例外狀況會包裝在之前便會傳播到父工作中，會在它自己的包裝該例外狀況的例外狀況例外狀況之前它會傳播回呼叫的執行緒。If a task has an attached child task that throws an exception, that exception is wrapped in an exception before it is propagated to the parent task, which wraps that exception in its own exception before it propagates it back to the calling thread. 在此情況下，屬性攔截的例外狀況， ，或是方法包含一個或多個執行個體，不原始的例外狀況，導致這個錯誤。In such cases, the property of the exception that is caught by the , , or method contains one or more instances, not the original exceptions that caused the fault. 若要避免必須逐一查看巢狀例外狀況，您可以使用方法來移除所有巢狀例外狀況，以便傳回的屬性物件包含原始例外狀況。To avoid having to iterate over nested exceptions, you can use the method to remove all the nested exceptions, so that the property of the returned object contains the original exceptions. 此方法以遞迴方式將壓平合併的所有執行個體會在目前的內部例外狀況的例外狀況執行個體。This method recursively flattens all instances of exceptions that are inner exceptions of the current instance . 傳回在新的內部例外狀況目前為根部的所有內部例外狀況，從例外狀況樹狀結構的聯集是執行個體。The inner exceptions returned in the new are the union of all the inner exceptions from exception tree rooted at the current instance. ## Examples 下例中，巢狀 執行個體被扁平化，並只在一個迴圈中處理。In the following example, nested instances are flattened and handled in just one loop. [!code-csharp[TPL_Exceptions#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/cs/flatten2.cs#22)] [!code-vb[TPL_Exceptions#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/vb/flatten2.vb#22)] 您也可以使用 方法，從被單一 執行個體之多個工作擲回的多個 執行個體中，重新擲回內部的例外狀況，如下例所示。You can also use the method to rethrow the inner exceptions from multiple instances thrown by multiple tasks in a single instance, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[TPL_Exceptions#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/cs/taskexceptions2.cs#13)] [!code-vb[TPL_Exceptions#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/vb/taskexceptions2.vb#13)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Handle(class System.Func`2<class System.Exception, bool> predicate) cil managed
Public Sub Handle (predicate As Func(Of Exception, Boolean))

param.name: predicate
param.span: 要針對每個例外狀況執行的述詞。

span.span: The predicate to execute for each exception.

param.span: 此述詞做為引數會接受 進行處理，並傳回布林值，表示是否已處理此例外狀況。

span.span: The predicate accepts as an argument the to be processed and returns a Boolean to indicate whether the exception was handled.

summary.span: 叫用每個 上的處理常式，其由這個 所包含。

span.span: Invokes a handler on each contained by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次叫用`predicate`，則傳回 true 或 false，指出是否已處理。Each invocation of the `predicate` returns true or false to indicate whether the was handled. 之後所有的引動過程，任何例外狀況，如果所有未處理的例外狀況將會進入新這將會擲回。After all invocations, if any exceptions went unhandled, all unhandled exceptions will be put into a new which will be thrown. 否則，方法只會傳回。Otherwise, the method simply returns. 如果任何引動過程的`predicate`會擲回例外狀況，則會停止所有多個例外狀況的處理，並立即傳播做為擲回的例外狀況-是。If any invocations of the `predicate` throws an exception, it will halt the processing of any more exceptions and immediately propagate the thrown exception as-is. ## Examples 一般情況下，會攔截的例外狀況處理常式例外狀況會使用`foreach`迴圈 （在 C#) 或`For Each`（在 Visual Basic) 迴圈來處理每個例外狀況，在其集合。Ordinarily, an exception handler that catches an exception uses a `foreach` loop (in C#) or `For Each` loop (in Visual Basic) to handle each exception in its collection. 相反地，下列範例會使用方法來處理每個例外狀況，而不是唯一會重新擲回的例外`CustomException`執行個體。Instead, the following example uses the method to handle each exception, and only re-throws exceptions that are not `CustomException` instances. [!code-csharp[TPL_Exceptions#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/cs/handlemethod2.cs#16)] [!code-vb[TPL_Exceptions#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/vb/handlemethod2.vb#16)] 以下是使用的更完整範例方法，以提供特殊處理列舉檔案時。The following is a more complete example that uses the method to provide special handling for an when enumerating files. [!code-csharp[TPL_Exceptions#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/cs/taskexceptions.cs#12)] [!code-vb[TPL_Exceptions#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/vb/taskexceptions.vb#12)]

span.span: The argument is null.

exception.span: 未處理由這個 包含的例外狀況。

span.span: An exception contained by this was not handled.
